text: Charles Keating (22 October 1941 â€“ 9 August 2014) was a British actor and narrator of audiobooks. Keating was known for his roles in All My Children and in Another World. He won a Daytime Emmy Award in 1996 for his role in Another World. Keating died on 9 August 2014 from cancer, aged 72. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:1941 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from cancer Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British voice actors Category:Actors from London
